description: Structures the response as a direct comparison between multiple items, concepts, or approaches. This decorator is ideal for highlighting similarities and differences across specific dimensions or criteria.

parameters.name: aspects
parameters.description: Specific aspects or dimensions to compare

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: The presentation format for the comparison

parameters.name: highlight
parameters.description: Whether to explicitly emphasize key differences

examples.description: Basic tabular comparison of specific aspects
examples.usage:
+++Comparison(aspects=[performance,cost,ease of use,ecosystem])
Compare React, Angular, and Vue for front-end development.
examples.result: Creates a table comparing React, Angular, and Vue across the specified aspects, with key differences highlighted

examples.usage:
+++Comparison(format=prose, highlight=false)
Compare democracy and authoritarianism as political systems.
examples.result: Delivers a flowing prose comparison between democracy and authoritarianism, covering key differences and similarities in paragraph form
